entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Near blizzard developing after midnight. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
